attributes.action: AWARD AN MBE TO JOANNA LUMLEY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise Joanna Lumley's fight for the Justice for Gurkha Campaign by awarding her an MBE in the New Year Honours List.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
